about_the_game:
Enhance your experience within the Exhale XR app with this VR immersion from the Exhale wellness library.

Experience Details
Stimulate your sense of calm with this vivid and color filled trek into nature. Begin at a cascading waterfall on the side of a mountain. Balanced on a fallen tree watch as mother nature steadily rushes the flow of these waters through the carved out mountains. Continuing into the immersion, it’s fall and you find yourself on a rock at the base of the mountains for sunset. Watch as the sun slowly moves on the reflecting waters. Finishing your experience you will find yourself on a snowy mountaintop in the early morning hours.

Purpose
Relaxation
Calming
Self meditation

Length
10:19

Specs
360° video
3840x2160
29.97fps
.mp4 file type

name: Exhale XR - Trail to Calm

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: OS Windows 7+
  • Processor: Intel i5 2nd gen equivalent or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidea GTX 1060 equivalent or better
  • DirectX: Version 10
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OS Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7 3rd gen equivalent or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVideo GTX 2070 or better
  • DirectX: Version 12
